ai-patthana16.6:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.6:0.3_0: Transmigration with the cause, for the sake of goodness,
ai-patthana16.6:1.1_0: A skillful teaching doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.6:1.1_1: A skillful teaching doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.6:1.1_2: A skillful person doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason. Those things don’t give rise to cause or reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.6:2.1_0: not to be able to satisfy
ai-patthana16.6:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching without cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.6:3.1_1: He’s not skilled in patients, skilled in hymns, and skilled in gladdening the mind.
ai-patthana16.6:3.1_2: roots or causes and reasons not because of cause or reason, three things don’t arise for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.6:5.1_1: without cause or reason, without cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.6:7.1_0: The group of nine is finished.
